1: <pb/><e>B'it yic sc'ochx eb' israel 'a Jerusalén</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová Yajl ach 'a satcha'an̈, a 'aych tzin q'ue q'uelan, yic tzin c'ann tas tzin nib'ej.</t>
2: <t>Tzon̈ 'och wal q'ueln 'aych Mamin, 'icha wal yiln 'och junc win moso spatron̈, mto 'icha yiln 'och 'ix ya'mal servil junc mach 'aj tz'a'w servil, 'ixta qui tan̈wni yo'ch a c'ojl 'ayn̈ on̈.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Comnoc wal tz'o'ch a c'ojl 'ayn̈ on̈, yujto matz techj sti eb' 'anma tic cuj on̈.</t>
4: <t>Caw wal tzcab' syal on̈ sb'uchn eb' rico 'a chuc chon̈b'al on̈, ax eb' b'an̈quintac, tzon̈ laj stzetzj eb' on̈.</t>
